title: Cosmic rays
creator_credit: Stanley Ruttenberg, Hugh Odishaw, Lothar Wolff and National Academy of Sciences (U.S.)
brief_description: Deals with the radiations observed on earth and first identified early in this century as a phenomenon originating in outer space. Current concepts of their origin are presented and their study related to other fields of scientific research, such as atomic and nuclear physics.
creator_credit_for_label: Stanley Ruttenberg, Hugh Odishaw, Lothar Wolff and National Academy of Sciences (U.S.)
